name: brawlObjects
description: Modified objects used by template Brawl, should be better suited for short games on small maps: disabled Sanctuaries, external  Taverns and Stables, disabled Redwood Observatories, enabled Covers of Darkness in their place, Cons have guards from 1-5 to 4-8 griffins, rewards 2-5 Monks, each stack can be upgraded, revisitable after 4 days, Hives have guards from 1-5 to 4-8 Lizardmen, reward 4-7 Serpent Flies, also revisitable  after 4 days and also each stack can be upgraded, also decreased the sizes and rewards of other banks and made them revisitable after 4 days: Cyclop Stockpile: 4x 3-6 Orcs and 1 Cyclop, reward: 1-4 all resources and 2-3 Ogres, Dwarven Treasury: 4x 3-9 dwarfs, 1-2 Pegasi, reward: 1000-2500 Gold, 2-5 Crystals, 1-2 Pegasi or 1 Dendroid/Gold Golem/Diamod Golem, Imp Cache: 5x 10-20 Imps, reward: 2-4 Mercury, 500-1000 Gold, 4 Gogs/3 Hell Hounds/2 Demons/1 Pit Fiend, Medusa Stores: 9-14 Medusas total in 5 stacks, reward: 3-4 Sulfur, 1000-1600 Gold, 2-3 Evil Eyes or Medusas, Naga Bank: 4x 3-6 Gargoyles and 1 Naga, reward: 2-4 Gems, 600-1200 Gold, 5 Dwarfs/5 Gargoyles/2 Medusas/1 Naga, Crypt: 3x8/2x10/10/10 Skeletons, 2x5/2x5/5/5 Walking Deads, 0/0/3/3 Wights, 0/0/1/2 Vampires, rewards: Treasure class Artifact, 799-999 Gold, 0-2 Wights. All creatures in each bank that have upgrades, both guards and rewards have a chance of being upgraded.
author: Warzyw647

1.0: cons guard lowered and reward changed to Monks
hives guarded by Lizards and give Serpent Flies
1.01: fixed bug caused by wrong parentheses in griffinConservatory
1.02: added the file with sanctuary ban forgotten in the previous version
1.03: decreased the sizes of other banks
limited each bank to 2 per zone but reverted densities to 100 from 40
1.04: limit max version from 1.3 branch to 1.3.x
